message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its unique features and benefits, we're extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this at a special introductory price of $15000.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product,  $15000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying at this time. I'm willing to purchase the product for $12000, which is my maximum budget.  Let me know if you're open to that price.
